title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed to Boost Rates by Year-End
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed to Boost Rates by Year-End
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Megan Greene\u0010Chief Economist\u0010Manulife Asset Mgmt\u0010\u0010Dan Heckman\u0010National Investment Consultant\u0010US Bank Wealth Management\u0010Discussing Federal Reserve officials setting an October start for shrinking their $4.5 trillion stockpile of assets, moving to unwind a pillar of their crisis-era support for the economy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
